name: Find the Differences: Halloween Gold Edition
name_original: Find the Differences: Halloween Gold Edition
description:
Witches, black cats and pumpkins, oh my! This find the difference game is filled with 12 charming illustrations to get you into the spooky Halloween spirit. Each picture has five differences- can you spot them all??

Kids and adults alike will love this classic game, updated with new and whimsical art. You’ll laugh out loud at all the funny pictures- is that pumpkin man playing a guitar?? A few spirits come by to say hello, and there are plenty of black cats and witches to keep you company in the game!

The graphics are simple and easy to look at for young children, and there’s nothing scary in the app- just good clean Halloween fun! All images are appropriate for all ages.

The game will give you hints where to look more carefully if you need help finding all the differences. Celebrate with fireworks when you find all of them in time!

-Illustrations by Philippe de Kemmeter.
-This app includes 12 levels.
-No third party advertisements.
-Internet connection not required to play.
-Does not contain links to social networks.
-Does not use data collection tools.
-Contains links to developer’s other apps.

Please see our privacy policy for more information.
http://lauratallardy.com/privacy-policy-en
